pr_title: Rule (java) unused local variables should be removed

timeline.message:
RULE (Java) Unused local variables should be removed

Made changes to comply with this rule

timeline.bodyText: A minor comment but the reason why boxes isn't used is because the subsequent line is commented. Perhaps we delete that line too?
timeline.author: arcturus2
arcturus2

timeline.bodyText: Wow. A core bit of code used whenever we save a file had this dead code for a long time. Thanks for this @formalhaut69.
timeline.author: arcturus2

timeline.message:
Update to ColFrame.java

Removed a comment as requested by Arcturus

timeline.bodyText: Did this variable and the related one in the else clause have a use at some stage? Just observing that removing these variables means the functions that created these booleans (>200 lines of code) are also now unused.
timeline.author: antares1470

timeline.bodyText: Has there been checks done on what these functions actually do? Some functions you can (sort of) get away with not assigning to a variable but a lot don't actually do anything really without the assignment (and in those circumstances it may be better to just remove the line all together).
timeline.author: antares1470

replies.bodyText: Yes, I left that one there because the function is being used to test if the dateString was inputted in the correct format. So if it can't be converted from the string, its not in the correct format and will throw an exception. It works but the converter isn't being used for what its designed for.
replies.author: formalhaut69

replies.bodyText: Alright sweet. I think there are a few others scattered around the place. Can I get confirmation that they fall in the same category?
replies.author: antares1470

replies.bodyText: Did you want me to go through and comment on these ones and explain why I left them?
replies.author: formalhaut69

replies.bodyText: It probably wouldn't hurt to leave a comment. Just so people in the future know that something is happening in the background
replies.author: antares1470

timeline.bodyText: This line is still required because it creates the spanningTree for this plugin but it doesn't need to be stored because the actual tree is never modified in this class
timeline.author: formalhaut69

timeline.bodyText: Still required to create the dragGestureRecognizer which is used later but the variable itself can be removed because its never read from.
timeline.author: formalhaut69

timeline.bodyText: I think that this Method is actually incomplete but at the moment it retrieves the panel to test if it exists.
timeline.author: formalhaut69

timeline.bodyText: Builds a connection between the two nodes on the graph but its unnecessary to store the variable itself.
timeline.author: formalhaut69

timeline.bodyText: The action doesn't need to be stored to have the ActionEvent function.
timeline.author: formalhaut69
